sentences.en: Either, I just stopped in appreciation airstrip.
sentences.cn: 不是, 我只是在欣赏飞机跑道罢了.

sentences.en: Eventually he spotted the airstrip spread out on a level terrain.
sentences.cn: 他终于找到了那个伸展在平地上的简易机场.

sentences.en: One day he noticed a crumpled Piper Tri - Pacer at the end of Mr. Cook's grass airstrip.
sentences.cn: 一天他注意到库克草地跑道的尽头有一架扭曲的PiperTri-Pacer飞机.

sentences.en: Properties accessed by road from the Alaska Highway and by an airstrip suitable for small aircraft.
sentences.cn: 物业有公路可以到达,并且连接阿拉斯加高速公路和适合小型飞机的机场.

sentences.en: The photographer arrived at the airstrip just an hour before sundown.
sentences.cn: 这位摄影师恰好在日落前一小时赶到了临时跑道.

sentences.en: The plane landed on a jungle airstrip.
sentences.cn: 飞机在丛林中的简易机场降落.

sentences.en: We landed on a grass airstrip, fifteen minutes after leaving Mahe.
sentences.cn: 离开马赫岛十五分钟后，我们在一块草地临时飞机跑道上降落了。

trans.tran_cn: 飞机跑道，机场跑道，简易跑道
trans.tran_en: a long narrow piece of land that planes can fly from or land on
